about_the_game:
The island of Djerba, located in the Gulf of Gabes off the coast of Tunisia, is not only the largest island of North Africa but also a popular destination for tourists, scuba divers and water sports enthusiasts. With just over 500 square kilometers in size, tourists have a short travel from the airport to their hotel after landing at the only airport of the island, Djerba-Zarzis. Now you can enjoy the International Airport of Djerba in X-Plane 12!

Features:

  • Accurate and realistic rendition of Zarzis International Airport, Djerba, Tunisia (DTTJ)

  • Updated ground and terminal featuring new jetways

  • Authentic light environment

  • XP 12 technologies (dynamic lighting, reflective textures, animated jetways with SAM)

  • Optimized for great performance and visual results
detailed_description:
The island of Djerba, located in the Gulf of Gabes off the coast of Tunisia, is not only the largest island of North Africa but also a popular destination for tourists, scuba divers and water sports enthusiasts. With just over 500 square kilometers in size, tourists have a short travel from the airport to their hotel after landing at the only airport of the island, Djerba-Zarzis. Now you can enjoy the International Airport of Djerba in X-Plane 12!

Features:

  • Accurate and realistic rendition of Zarzis International Airport, Djerba, Tunisia (DTTJ)

  • Updated ground and terminal featuring new jetways

  • Authentic light environment

  • XP 12 technologies (dynamic lighting, reflective textures, animated jetways with SAM)

  • Optimized for great performance and visual results

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD Ryzen CPU with at least 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.3-capable graphics card (AMD/ Nvidia) with at least 6 GB VRAM (8+ GB recommended)
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS10.15+
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD Ryzen CPU with at least 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.3-capable graphics card (AMD/ Nvidia) with at least 6 GB VRAM (8+ GB recommended)
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended

name: X-Plane 12 Add-on: FSDG - Djerba

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD Ryzen CPU with at least 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.3-capable graphics card (AMD/ Nvidia) with at least 6 GB VRAM (8+ GB recommended)
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: The island of Djerba, located in the Gulf of Gabes off the coast of Tunisia, is not only the largest island of North Africa but also a popular destination for tourists, scuba divers and water sports enthusiasts.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
